item.title: Breaking: FTX Launches Claim Portal for Creditors
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
As promised, the bankrupt digital currency trading platform, FTX Derivatives Exchange has launched a ‘Claim’ portal that will enable all of its creditors to officially file claims as one of the first steps towards recovering their locked funds from the trading platform. The move comes on the back of more than $7 billion recovered by

item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Ethereum price is wobbling slightly in the red on Tuesday as bulls and bears way their options out of a three-week-long consolidation.
